N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7870.6 - Notice to designated person

State Regulations
(a) Every distributor shall notify a
designated person of a cutoff if the customer has requested that such notice be
given. (b) Every distributor shall
attempt to call the designated person by telephone on the same date the
distributor attempts to provide telephone notice to the customer. If the first
attempt is unsuccessful, the distributor shall make at least one additional
attempt. (c) If the designated
person is contacted, the distributor shall inform the designated person of the
name and address of the customer involved, and provide the designated person
with the same telephone notification the customer would receive. Notes
